item.title: In The Shadows Home
item.description: In The Shadows is a fictional universe created in 2014 by SlRvb. The universe originates from an incomplete work of the same name.

item.title: Stories
item.description: These are the written works of fiction within the In The Shadows Universe. Each story is set in an alternate universe from the lore that In The Shadows established as the original lore of the universe.
